languages.text: {n}Соломон оборачивается к арбитрам. Глаза проктора горят, его голос гремит необыкновенной страстью:{/n} "Арбитес, обратившись против префекта и маршала, вы не нарушите Лекс Империалис, наоборот — лишь воля Императора правит нами, и Ему угоден порядок и стабильность в подвластных мирах. Мы не должны допустить разбойного передела власти, наша задача — защитить законн{mf|ого|ую} правител{mf|я|ьницу} протектората и восстановить справедливость".

{n}Solomorne turns to the Arbitrators. The Proctor's eyes are blazing, his voice thundering with unusual passion:{/n} "Arbitrators of the Adeptus Arbites, by turning against the prefect and the Marshal, you will not be in violation of the Lex Imperialis, on the contrary — we are governed by the Emperor's will alone, and He is pleased by order and stability on His vassal worlds. We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон оборачивается к арбитрам. Глаза проктора горят, его голос гремит необыкновенной страстью:{/n} "Арбитес, обратившись против префекта и маршала, вы не нарушите Лекс Империалис, наоборот — лишь воля Императора правит нами, и Ему угоден порядок и стабильность в подвластных мирах. Мы не должны допустить разбойного передела власти, наша задача — защитить законн{mf|ого|ую} правител{mf|я|ьницу} протектората и восстановить справедливость".

We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wendet sich den Arbitratoren zu. Die Augen des Proktors funkeln, seine Stimme ist von ungewöhnlicher Leidenschaft erfüllt.{/n} "Arbitratoren des Adeptus Arbites, wendet Ihr Euch gegen die Präfektin und den Marschall, verstoßt Ihr nicht gegen das Lex Imperia, im Gegenteil... wir dienen allein dem Willen des Imperators, und Er erfreut sich an Ordnung und Stabilität auf Seinen Vasallenwelten. Wir dürfen nicht zulassen, dass diese krude Machtübernahme erfolgreich ist. Wir haben die Pflicht {mf|den legitimen Herrscher|die legitime Herrscherin} des Protektorats zu schützen und die Gerechtigkeit wiederherzustellen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the Arbitrators. The Proctor's eyes are blazing, his voice thundering with unusual passion:{/n} "Arbitrators of the Adeptus Arbites, by turning against the prefect and the Marshal, you will not be in violation of the Lex Imperialis, on the contrary — we are governed by the Emperor's will alone, and He is pleased by order and stability on His vassal worlds. We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wendet sich den Arbitratoren zu. Die Augen des Proktors funkeln, seine Stimme ist von ungewöhnlicher Leidenschaft erfüllt.{/n} "Arbitratoren des Adeptus Arbites, wendet Ihr Euch gegen die Präfektin und den Marschall, verstoßt Ihr nicht gegen das Lex Imperia, im Gegenteil... wir dienen allein dem Willen des Imperators, und Er erfreut sich an Ordnung und Stabilität auf Seinen Vasallenwelten. Wir dürfen nicht zulassen, dass diese krude Machtübernahme erfolgreich ist. Wir haben die Pflicht {mf|den legitimen Herrscher|die legitime Herrscherin} des Protektorats zu schützen und die Gerechtigkeit wiederherzustellen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se tourne vers les arbitrators. Les yeux du proctor brillent d'un éclat furieux, tandis qu'il déclare d'une voix tonitruante, chargée d'une passion inhabituelle :{/n} « Arbitrators de l'Adeptus Arbites, vous n'enfreindrez pas la Lex Imperialis en vous dressant contre la préfète et le maréchal. Bien au contraire. Nous n'obéissons qu'à la seule volonté de l'Empereur et Il aime que l'ordre et la stabilité règnent sur Ses mondes vassaux. Nous devons empêcher cette grossière tentative de prise de pouvoir. Notre devoir est de protéger le souverain légitime du protectorat et de rétablir la justice. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the Arbitrators. The Proctor's eyes are blazing, his voice thundering with unusual passion:{/n} "Arbitrators of the Adeptus Arbites, by turning against the prefect and the Marshal, you will not be in violation of the Lex Imperialis, on the contrary — we are governed by the Emperor's will alone, and He is pleased by order and stability on His vassal worlds. We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se tourne vers les arbitrators. Les yeux du proctor brillent d'un éclat furieux, tandis qu'il déclare d'une voix tonitruante, chargée d'une passion inhabituelle :{/n} « Arbitrators de l'Adeptus Arbites, vous n'enfreindrez pas la Lex Imperialis en vous dressant contre la préfète et le maréchal. Bien au contraire. Nous n'obéissons qu'à la seule volonté de l'Empereur et Il aime que l'ordre et la stabilité règnent sur Ses mondes vassaux. Nous devons empêcher cette grossière tentative de prise de pouvoir. Notre devoir est de protéger le souverain légitime du protectorat et de rétablir la justice. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙面向全体法务官。他的目光炯炯有神，声音中充满了不同寻常的激情。{/n}“帝国法务部的全体法务官，你们违抗元帅与行政官的行为并没有违背帝国法典。恰恰相反，我们只听命于神皇的意愿，祂期望祂的领土处于秩序、稳定的状态。因此，我们决不能允许暴力篡权的罪行，我们的任务就是保护王朝的合法统治者，恢复正义。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the Arbitrators. The Proctor's eyes are blazing, his voice thundering with unusual passion:{/n} "Arbitrators of the Adeptus Arbites, by turning against the prefect and the Marshal, you will not be in violation of the Lex Imperialis, on the contrary — we are governed by the Emperor's will alone, and He is pleased by order and stability on His vassal worlds. We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙面向全体法务官。他的目光炯炯有神，声音中充满了不同寻常的激情。{/n}“帝国法务部的全体法务官，你们违抗元帅与行政官的行为并没有违背帝国法典。恰恰相反，我们只听命于神皇的意愿，祂期望祂的领土处于秩序、稳定的状态。因此，我们决不能允许暴力篡权的罪行，我们的任务就是保护王朝的合法统治者，恢复正义。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se gira hacia los Arbitrator. Los ojos del Procurador arden y su voz retumba con una pasión insólita:{/n} «Arbitrator del Adeptus Arbites, al rechazar a la prefecta y al Mariscal, no violaréis la Lex Imperialis, sino todo lo contrario: nos gobierna únicamente la voluntad del Emperador, y a Él le complacen la estabilidad y el orden en Sus mundos vasallos. No debemos permitir que este vergonzoso intento por tomar el poder tenga éxito. Nuestro deber es proteger a{mf|l| la} gobernante legítim{mf|o|a} del protectorado y restaurar la justicia».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the Arbitrators. The Proctor's eyes are blazing, his voice thundering with unusual passion:{/n} "Arbitrators of the Adeptus Arbites, by turning against the prefect and the Marshal, you will not be in violation of the Lex Imperialis, on the contrary — we are governed by the Emperor's will alone, and He is pleased by order and stability on His vassal worlds. We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se gira hacia los Arbitrator. Los ojos del Procurador arden y su voz retumba con una pasión insólita:{/n} «Arbitrator del Adeptus Arbites, al rechazar a la prefecta y al Mariscal, no violaréis la Lex Imperialis, sino todo lo contrario: nos gobierna únicamente la voluntad del Emperador, y a Él le complacen la estabilidad y el orden en Sus mundos vasallos. No debemos permitir que este vergonzoso intento por tomar el poder tenga éxito. Nuestro deber es proteger a{mf|l| la} gobernante legítim{mf|o|a} del protectorado y restaurar la justicia».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはアービトレイターたちの方へ向き直った。代理人の目は燃えるように輝き、声にはいつになく激しい情熱がこもっている。{/n}「高等裁定局のアービトレイターたちよ、総監と将帥に背を向けることはレックス・インペリアへの違反にはならない。むしろその逆だ。俺たちを統べるのは皇帝陛下の御意志のみ。陛下は従属惑星における秩序と安定をこそ望まれる。俺たちは、この粗雑な権力の簒奪を成功させてはならない。俺たちの使命は、保護領の正統なる統治者を守り、正義を回復することにある」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the Arbitrators. The Proctor's eyes are blazing, his voice thundering with unusual passion:{/n} "Arbitrators of the Adeptus Arbites, by turning against the prefect and the Marshal, you will not be in violation of the Lex Imperialis, on the contrary — we are governed by the Emperor's will alone, and He is pleased by order and stability on His vassal worlds. We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, Yargıcılara dönüyor. Üsteğmen'in gözleri alev alev... Sesinde alışılmadık bir tutku yankılanıyor.{/n} "Adeptus Arbites Yargıcıları, Prefekt ve Miralay'a karşı gelmekle Lex İmperialis'i ihlal etmiş olmazsınız. Tam aksine... Bizlere yalnızca İmparator'un iradesi hükmeder. O, kendisine tabii olan dünyalarında düzen ve denge hâkim olsun ister. Bu ilkel güç münakaşalarına mahal vermemeliyiz. Vazifemiz, protektoranın yasal hükümdarını korumak ve adaleti sağlamaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the Arbitrators. The Proctor's eyes are blazing, his voice thundering with unusual passion:{/n} "Arbitrators of the Adeptus Arbites, by turning against the prefect and the Marshal, you will not be in violation of the Lex Imperialis, on the contrary — we are governed by the Emperor's will alone, and He is pleased by order and stability on His vassal worlds. We must not allow this crude power grab to succeed. Our task is to protect the legitimate ruler of the protectorate and to restore justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, Yargıcılara dönüyor. Üsteğmen'in gözleri alev alev... Sesinde alışılmadık bir tutku yankılanıyor:{/n} "Adeptus Arbites Yargıcıları, Prefekt ve Miralay'a karşı gelmekle Lex İmperialis'i ihlal etmiş olmazsınız. Tam aksine... Bizlere yalnızca İmparator'un İradesi hükmeder. O, vasal dünyalarında düzen ve denge hâkim olsun ister. Bu ilkel güç münakaşalarına mahal vermemeliyiz. Vazifemiz, protektoranın yasal hükümdarını korumak ve adaleti sağlamaktır."
